problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, if AP = PB, ∠APB = N_0 ∠ACB, AC and PB intersect at point D, and PB = N_1, PD = N_2, then AD•DC is equal to ()
raw_answer: 解:如图,延长BP到Q,使PQ=BP；连接AQ；则∠Q=∠PAQ,∠APB=∠Q+∠PAQ=2∠Q；∵∠APB=2∠ACB,∴∠Q=∠C,而∠QDA=∠BDC,∴△ADQ∽△BDC,∴\frac{QD}{DC}=\frac{AD}{BD},即AD•DC=QD•BD,而DQ=5+3=8,BD=2,∴AD•DC=16,故选:A．
raw_comment: 此题主要考查了相似三角形的判定及其性质的应用问题；作辅助线,构造相似三角形,灵活运用有关定理来分析、判断、推理或解答是解题的关键．
